### Description

Write here a short description of the bug

### Scenario

Describe here step by step, how we can reproduce the bug. (this is the most important section, try to detail all your actions)

### Expected Result

Write here the expected behaviour (if you have an idea of what it should be, otherwise leave this section empty)

### Actual Result

Write here the actual behaviour

### Additional information

Here, you can add anything that can help developers to fix the bug
